title: Hdi Dictionary
description: Hdi dictionary by Zygmunt Frajzyngier and Paul Eguchi and Roger Prafé and Megan Schwabauer with Erin Shay and Henry Tourneux
citation: Frajzyngier, Zygmunt and Eguchi, Paul and Prafé, Roger and Schwabauer, Megan (with Erin Shay, Henry Tourneux). 2017. Hdi dictionary. Dictionaria 2. 1-1681. DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.3067648 (Available online at https://dictionaria.clld.org/contributions/hdi)
